page.description: Get the height of the dialog in inches based on a dialog definition.

prototypes.prototype: Height as C = UI_INFO_DLG_DEF_HEIGHT( Title as C )
Height as C = UI_INFO_DLG_DEF_HEIGHT( Expression as C )

argument.name: Title
argument.description: The title of a visible Xdialog.

argument.name: Expression
argument.description: Xdialog code that produces a visible control.

page.discussion: The UI_INFO_DLG_DEF_HEIGHT() function tells you how high the specified Xdialog expression will be.

section.title: Example
section.description: In this example, lastname prompt and the field are on same line, so the Xdialog will be .57 inches high.
In this example, the lastname prompt and the field are on separate lines (because of the semi-colon after lastname:). The Xdialog will be .72 inches high.
